patthana3.3:1.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:2.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:3.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.3:5.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:6.1_0: Sappaccayo kusalo dhammo sappaccayassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:7.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:8.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:9.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.3:10.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:11.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:12.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā ekaṁ. (Sabbattha ekaṁ, saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:13.1_0: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:14.1_0: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:15.1_0: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:16.1_0: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:17.1_0: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo.
patthana3.3:19.1_0: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana3.3:20.1_0: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana3.3:25.1_0: Saṅkhataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkhato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:27.1_0: Anidassanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:28.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.3:29.1_0: Anidassanaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:30.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.3:31.1_0: Anidassanaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:32.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:34.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:35.1_0: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:36.1_0: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:37.1_0: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:38.1_0: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati.
patthana3.3:39.1_0: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana3.3:39.1_2: Anidassano abyākato dhammo sanidassanassa abyākatassa ca anidassanassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—sahajātādhipati.
patthana3.3:40.1_0: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—pakatūpanissayo.
patthana3.3:41.1_0: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana3.3:44.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:45.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vippayutte ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:47.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:48.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ (pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.3:49.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:49.1_1: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:49.1_2: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato ca appaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … nava.
patthana3.3:50.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.3:52.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:53.1_0: Nahetuyā nava …pe… novigate nava. (Sabbattha nava, saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:54.1_0: Appaṭigho abyākato dhammo appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:56.1_0: Sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:60.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
patthana3.3:62.1_0: Arūpiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:63.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.3:64.1_0: Arūpiṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:66.1_0: Rūpiṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:67.1_0: Arūpiṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:68.1_0: Rūpiṁ abyākatañca arūpiṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:69.1_0: Rūpiṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:72.1_0: Arūpī abyākato dhammo arūpissa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:77.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
patthana3.3:79.1_0: Lokiyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:80.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:81.1_0: Lokiyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.3:82.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:83.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… kamme dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ, anulomaṁ.)
patthana3.3:84.1_0: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:85.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:86.1_0: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:87.1_0: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:88.1_0: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:89.1_0: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:90.1_0: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana3.3:91.1_0: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—sahajātādhipati.
patthana3.3:91.1_1: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati.
patthana3.3:93.1_0: Lokiyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:95.1_0: Lokiyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:96.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:97.1_0: Lokiyaṁ abyākatañca lokuttaraṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:100.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:101.1_0: Lokiyo abyākato dhammo lokiyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:102.1_0: Lokuttaro abyākato dhammo lokuttarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.3:104.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
patthana3.3:106.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:106.1_1: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:106.1_2: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo ca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.3:107.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.3:108.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.3:110.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.3:111.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo kenaci viññeyyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.3:116.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
patthana3.3:116.1_2: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ akusalampi kenaci viññeyyaṁ abyākatampi kenaci viññeyyakusalasadisaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
